abstract: The chief executive of Cisco sees an insatiable demand for video and that, to him, means more networking equipment. By 2013, he predicted, there would be 140 Internet-connected devices per person.
snippet: The chief executive of Cisco sees an insatiable demand for video and that, to him, means more networking equipment. By 2013, he predicted, there would be 140 Internet-connected devices per person.
lead_paragraph: Everybody get your cameras and start filming something, pronto. Networking giant Cisco Systems is waiting.

headline.main: Everyone Will Be a TV Station Soon
